channel.title: Need help with my DDS
channel.description:
hello on my server my whip hits around 40 with 192 bonus, and 99 strength, but with dds my max hit is like 20/0. how can i make it hit atleast 30-30 with 192 (ish)bonus and 99 strength, please help!
also for some reason i always hit a number on the top and a 0 on the bottom,, example: 20/0....10/0...9/0, always.

item.title: Need help with my DDS
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(31); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(31); SpecialDelay -= 3; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(31); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 3; } }

There’s mine, has a timer and GFX

item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

here try mine public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2) { staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(20); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; AnimationReset = true; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(20); SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(20); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); startAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !DDS) DDS = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && DDS) DDS = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); }[\code]

item.title: Need help with my DDS
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

it never worked, the top number hits and the bottom still hits 0… like 15/0…or 20/0. here ill show you my dds special.

public void DDSSpecial() {
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
hitDiff = 15 + misc.random(22);
speC(0x426, 0, 0, 25, 3);
actionTimer = 4;
} else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(playerMaxHitMelee);
speCP(0, 0, 0x426, 4, 3);
}
}

public void SpecDamg(int maxDamage) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{

(theres more its just too long and nothing you really need i dont think)
